unnormalised: Dr. Rajesh Kumar Sharma, Ph.D., is now appointed as the lead researcher, while Ms. Aishwarya Krishnan, M.Sc., joins as a junior associate with a GPA of 9.8/10.
normalised: Doctor Rajesh Kumar Sharma, P-h-D, is now appointed as the lead researcher, while Miss Aishwarya Krishnan, M-S-c, joins as a junior associate with a G-P-A of nine point eight divided by ten.
